# databradford

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of databradford is to provide a quick way to use open datasets for 
Bradford.

## Installation

You can install the development version of databradford from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dataning/databradford")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(databradford)
## basic example code
```
